mapper.insert:
insert all
into ARTICLE( ARTCL_GU, ARTCL_DONG, ARTCL_ZIP, ARTCL_BC, ARTCL_COMPLX, ARTCL_NM, ARTCL_TY, ARTCL_PRPS_PLS, ARTCL_MN_PRPS, ARTCL_CONST_Y, ARTCL_RD, ARTCL_RD_DETAIL, ARTCL_LAT, ARTCL_LNG ) values ( #{aVo.artcl_gu }, #{aVo.artcl_dong}, #{aVo.artcl_zip}, #{aVo.artcl_bc}, #{aVo.artcl_complx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_ty, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_prps_pls, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_mn_prps, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_const_y, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_rd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_rd_detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_lat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aVo.artcl_lng, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) LOG ERRORS REJECT LIMIT UNLIMITED
select * from dual

insert all
into DEAL ( DL_NO, DL_EXCV_AREA, DL_TY, DL_PRICE, DL_DEPOS, DL_RNT, DL_CONT_YM, DL_CONT_D, DL_FLR, DL_GU, DL_DONG, DL_ZIP ) values ( get_seq_dl, #{dVo.dl_excv_area, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{dVo.dl_ty, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_price, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dVo.dl_depos, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dVo.dl_rnt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_cont_ym, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_cont_d, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_flr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_gu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_dong, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dVo.dl_zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
select * from dual
mapper.select: select * from article where artcl_lat is null and artcl_lng is null
